data.name: The Obsessive Shadow
data.detailed_description:
The Obsessive Shadow is a VR Survival horror game about fending off a home intruder that you can't exactly identify... Keep yourself safe with nothing but a flashlight and the human eye...

WHAT'S THAT?

You're going about your business winding down at home for the night when suddenly you see a very strange emergency broadcast come on the T.V. followed by a knock on the window...

WHO'S THERE?

Watch your windows, something is close by and watching you...

GOTCHA!

your flashlight is your best friend

data.short_description: The Obsessive Shadow is a VR Survival horror game about fending off a home intruder. Keep yourself safe with nothing but a flashlight and the naked eye...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10. Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
